document.heading: OTO Hotel at Constitution Square Economic Development Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-188, the “OTO Hotel at Constitution Square Economic Development Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-431, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 16, 2010, and April 20, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 11, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-400 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-188 became effective on July 1, 2010.
